list_definition.definition: (also adjective) (of) the material of which the trunk and branches of trees are composed

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She gathered some wood for the fire
I like the smell of a wood fire.
They went for a walk in the woods.

list_definition.definition: a golf-club whose head is made of wood.

The shelter belt grant has been withdrawn; so has the small woods planting grant.
The house was isolated in some woods on a hill and the effects were visible from a large distance, drawing the audience to the spot.
Distinguishing the woods from the trees.
The woods today are less disturbed, otherwise we would not be seeing an explosive growth in the population of roe deer.
